name: part_002
file: tmp_【#雪花ラミィ生誕ライブ】ゲストいっぱい！誕生日LIVE【雪花ラミィ⧸ホロライブ】 [hEkHj1WZekU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Yukihana Lamy gives an MC, reflecting on the first part of her birthday live and introducing what's to come.
Lamy performs 'Joyful' by Ikimonogakari with guests Inugami Korone, Nekomata Okayu, and Shishiro Botan.

subtitles.original: みんなー！こんらみー！
subtitles.english: Everyone! Konlamy!

subtitles.original: こんらみー！
subtitles.english: Konlamy!

subtitles.original: え、今日は雪花ラミィのバースデーライブに来てくれて、ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Um, thank you for coming to Yukihana Lamy's Birthday Live today!

subtitles.original: え、早速ですが、一曲目『スタートダッシュ』、
subtitles.english: Um, to start things off, the first song was "Start Dash",

subtitles.original: え、二曲目『ブルーバード』を聴いていただきました。
subtitles.english: and the second song you heard was "Blue Bird".

subtitles.original: みんな、どうだった？どうだった？
subtitles.english: Everyone, how was it? How was it?

subtitles.original: ラミィダンス頑張りました！みんなダンス見てくれた？
subtitles.english: Lamy worked hard on the dancing! Did everyone see it?

subtitles.original: みんな、頑張ったよ！ラミィ頑張ったよ！
subtitles.english: Everyone, I worked hard! Lamy worked hard!

subtitles.original: え、そしてですね、本日のハッシュタグはこちら！ジャジャン！
subtitles.english: And also, here is today's hashtag! Ta-da!

subtitles.original: #雪花ラミィバースデーライブとなっております！イェイイェイ！
subtitles.english: It's #YukihanaLamyBirthdayLive! Yay yay!

subtitles.original: 今日はね、このハッシュタグをたくさんみんな呟いてもらえたら嬉しいです。よろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: I'd be happy if everyone tweeted a lot using this hashtag today. Thank you!

subtitles.original: え、それでは、ここからはですね、ゲストと一緒に歌っていきたいと思います！
subtitles.english: Well then, from here on, I'm going to sing together with guests!

subtitles.original: あの先輩や、あの同期まで！
subtitles.english: Including that senior, and even that genmate!

subtitles.original: 最後までホロたっぷりと、なっておりますので、みんな楽しみにしててね！
subtitles.english: It's going to be packed with Holo until the very end, so please look forward to it!

subtitles.original: え、そしてですね、最後には告知もありますので、ぜひぜひ最後まで楽しんでいってください！
subtitles.english: And also, there's an announcement at the end, so please enjoy yourselves until the very end!

subtitles.original: それでは...んー、ま！
subtitles.english: Well then... *kiss*

subtitles.original: じょいふる
subtitles.english: Joyful

subtitles.original: 君の声を聞かせて
subtitles.english: Let me hear your voice

subtitles.original: さあ冒険してみない？
subtitles.english: Why don't we go on an adventure?

subtitles.original: 楽しいこと始めよう
subtitles.english: Let's start something fun

subtitles.original: 遊びたい 絶対 遊びたい
subtitles.english: I want to play, I absolutely want to play

subtitles.original: I wanna JOY to JOY to JOY to 陽気な Baby
subtitles.english: I wanna JOY to JOY to JOY to cheerful Baby

subtitles.original: JOY to JOY to JOY to ハッピーな People
subtitles.english: JOY to JOY to JOY to HAPPY People

subtitles.original: 弱虫なんかじゃない
subtitles.english: I'm not a coward

subtitles.original: 自信ありげに PEACE SIGN
subtitles.english: Confidence in a PEACE SIGN

subtitles.original: 君の瞳にキスして
subtitles.english: Kiss your eyes

subtitles.original: 笑いたい 絶対 笑いたい
subtitles.english: I want to laugh, I absolutely want to laugh

subtitles.original: I wanna JOY to JOY to JOY to 陽気な Baby
subtitles.english: I wanna JOY to JOY to JOY to cheerful Baby

subtitles.original: JOY to JOY to JOY to ハッピーな SAY YEAH
subtitles.english: JOY to JOY to JOY to HAPPY SAY YEAH

subtitles.original: 君の心もそう もっと DO-DO
subtitles.english: Your heart too, more DO-DO

subtitles.original: 僕の心もそう いっそ GO-GO
subtitles.english: My heart too, rather GO-GO

subtitles.original: はじけてるんじゃない？ It's JOYFUL PA-PI-PU-PE-PO-PA-PU
subtitles.english: Aren't we bursting? It's JOYFUL PA-PI-PU-PE-PO-PA-PU

subtitles.original: I wanna JOY to JOY to JOY to 陽気な Baby
subtitles.english: I wanna JOY to JOY to JOY to cheerful Baby

subtitles.original: JOY to JOY to JOY to ハッピーな People
subtitles.english: JOY to JOY to JOY to HAPPY People

subtitles.original: ドキドキしちゃうの なぜだどう？
subtitles.english: Why is my heart beating so fast?

subtitles.original: ゾクゾクしちゃうの なぜだどう？
subtitles.english: Why am I getting shivers?

subtitles.original: この指に止まるのはどんな運命なんだ 全部知りたいな
subtitles.english: What kind of fate will land on this finger? I want to know everything

subtitles.original: じょいふるだって 終わっちゃう
subtitles.english: Even being joyful comes to an end

subtitles.original: Everybody きっと 終わっちゃう
subtitles.english: Everybody, it will surely end

subtitles.original: いついつまでも この時も 最終形態はきっと 修正なしで
subtitles.english: Forever and ever, even this moment, the final form will surely be without correction

subtitles.original: DO WE DO WE DO WE DO DO...
subtitles.english: DO WE DO WE DO WE DO DO...

subtitles.original: PA-PI-PU-PE-PO-PA-PI-PU-PE-TIME!
subtitles.english: PA-PI-PU-PE-PO-PA-PI-PU-PE-TIME!

subtitles.original: JOY TO JOY TO JOY TO POP NA BABY
subtitles.english: JOY TO JOY TO JOY TO POP NA BABY

subtitles.original: I wanna JOY to JOY to JOY to 陽気な Baby
subtitles.english: I wanna JOY to JOY to JOY to cheerful Baby

subtitles.original: JOY to JOY to JOY to ハッピーな SAY YEAH
subtitles.english: JOY to JOY to JOY to HAPPY SAY YEAH

subtitles.original: 君の心もそう もっと DO-DO
subtitles.english: Your heart too, more DO-DO

subtitles.original: 僕の心もそう いっそ GO-GO
subtitles.english: My heart too, rather GO-GO

subtitles.original: はじけてるんじゃない？ It's JOYFUL PA-PI-PU-PE-PO-PA-PU
subtitles.english: Aren't we bursting? It's JOYFUL PA-PI-PU-PE-PO-PA-PU

subtitles.original: JOY! JOY! JOY! JOY! JOY! JOY! JOY! JOY!
subtitles.english: JOY! JOY! JOY! JOY! JOY! JOY! JOY! JOY!
